version_description:
- We fixed several bugs and improved the overall app experience a lot.
- The app interface has been tweaked to fit more phones.
Even when changes aren’t immediately obvious, they still mean progress.

- We fixed several bugs and improved the overall app experience a lot.
- The app interface has been tweaked to fit more phones.
Even when changes aren’t immediately obvious, they still mean progress.

• We put more information on your Kuda dashboard to make your life easier. That’s less tapping around to get to important things.

• The Kuda Naira MasterCard is here and you can request, activate, block and delete your new card entirely on the app,

• We put more information on your Kuda dashboard to make your life easier. That’s less tapping around to get to important things.

• The Kuda Naira MasterCard is here and you can request, activate, block and delete your new card entirely on the app,

You can now choose to see all your phone contacts who have a Kuda account. Faster free transfers every time!

Virtual cards are here! Create a virtual Kuda Naira MasterCard to pay online.

We added an anti-scam reminder before transfers to uns
